sentence.Network_en: Uncertainty is a discouragement to investment.
sentence.Network_cn: 不确定性令投资者裹足不前。

sentence.Network_en: He persevered despite discouragement from those around him.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管周围一片劝阻声，他还是锲而不舍。

sentence.Network_en: an atmosphere of discouragement and despair

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高考英语任务型阅读高频率单词_百度文库 ... pressure 压力 discouragement 灰心,气馁 discovery 发现,被发现之事.
事实上,是因为父母误用了平等、民主的观念,并没有使孩子们学到如何尊重别人、尊重规则,而且溺爱与压制同样会使孩子感到沮丧(discouragement)。很明显,父母都知道辱骂.
discouraging adj. 令人泄气的discouragement n. 泄气，灰心；挫折[小试] 用discourage的适当形式填空。

list.abs: bing词典——英语部落格 - 人人小站 ... Present value： 现值 Discouraged workers： 丧失信心的工人 Disposable income： 可支配收 …
失去信心的工人（discouraged workers）是游荡在劳动力市场边缘的人员中的一部分，他们因就业市场不景气而暂时没有寻找工作。 …
所谓的沮丧劳工(discouraged worker)指的是原本没有工作想要找工作，但放弃找工作者因此，按照我们上面的定义~他们应该归于非 …
discovery　 探查打法discouraging card　 非鼓励牌distribution　分配（牌型）
请问气氛的“氛”是平声还是仄声？_百度知道 ... 气度[ bearing] 气短[ be discouraged] 气短[ breathe hard;short-winded].

entry.def: Discouragement is the act of trying to make someone not want to do something.

example.ex: He persevered despite discouragement from those around him.
example.tran: 尽管周围一片劝阻声，他还是锲而不舍。

entry.def: A discouragement is something that makes you unwilling to do something because you are afraid of the consequences.

example.ex: Uncertainty is a discouragement to investment.
example.tran: 不确定性令投资者裹足不前。

means.word_mean: 1. the feeling of despair in the face of obstacles
2. the expression of opposition and disapproval

auth_sentence.content: Too hasty publication would be a discouragement to you now.
auth_sentence.res_content: Too hasty publication would be a discouragement to you now.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Too hasty publication would be a discouragement to you now.

auth_sentence.content: His whole attitude eloquent of discouragement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His whole attitude eloquent of discouragement.

sentences.en: The unfavorable reviews of his first novel were a great discouragement to him.
sentences.cn: 他第一本小说所得的不利评论令他极其灰心丧气。

sentences.en: The loud music was a discouragement to conversation.
sentences.cn: 吵闹的音乐妨碍了别人谈话。
